#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType Round.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CRound Round]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Round (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Details about a round of golf: Location of the flags on greens (usually called pin sheet),
			weather conditions, date of the round, opponenents and partners, and the scorecard.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            ( uid`*`, date, hole-placement?, weather?, foursome?, game?, wager?, note?, scorecard   )
  </...>
----
  		
=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| date ||  					Date and time of the round.				 || xs:dateTime ||
|| foursome ||  					Player information for the round of golf.				 || golfml:FourSome ||
|| game ||  					Information about the game(s) played during the round of golf.				 || golfml:GolfGame ||
|| hole-placement ||  					Placement of holes for the round of golf.				 || golfml:HolePlacements ||
|| note ||  					Comment about the round.				 || golfml:Note ||
|| scorecard ||  					Scorecard of the round for the player.				 || golfml:Scorecard ||
|| uid ||  					Unique identifier for an application.				 || golfml:UID ||
|| wager ||  					Information about the wagers during the round of golf.				 || golfml:RoomForExtension ||
|| weather ||  					Weather information for the round of golf.				 || golfml:Weather ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CPlayer Player]
